BBEX3.A.CRC.EUR.CA.AB.A04: Exchange rates (comparable rates) for the euro in Costa Rica * / EUR 1 = CRC ... (selling)
Source: Since March 2003: Banco Central de Costa Rica, San José. 1999 - February 2003: Dresdner Bank Lateinamerika AG, Hamburg. (for US dollar rates in each case)

Methodology: * We do not have any data from Costa Rica on euro exchange rates; the comparable rates were calculated on the basis of month-end exchange rates for the US dollar in Costa Rica in conjunction with the respective euro reference exchange rate of the European Central Bank for the US dollar.
